attributes.action: instruct his Home Secretary to seek Sir Ian Blair's resignation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the Independent Police Complaints Commission's (IPCC) report a propos Sir Ian Blair and especially regarding him alledgedly being responsible for delays and much of the avoidable difficulty experienced, we, the undersigned, encourage the Prime Minister to instruct his Home Secretary to seek Sir Ian Blair's resignation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
